title: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank raises secured business share
description: Ujjivan Small Finance Bank expanded its secured loan portfolio to 31.5%, a 440 basis point increase over the past year, aiming for 40% in three years. The total loan portfolio grew 19% to ₹30,091 crore. Despite this growth, its gross NPA ratio slightly increased to 2.3%. Deposits rose 22% to ₹32,500 crore.
